about working with both him and Sergey for a long time to come." " Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade," Page said in a written statement. The results speak for themselves. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly. . Eric Schmidt and Page said the moves are intended to speed up decision-making at the top of the Internet giant, which also posted strong fourth- quarter results. The management reshuffle has been brought about to streamline decision making and create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, Eric Schmidt said. The surprise shake-up announced Thursday appears to be driven by Mr. Eric Schmidt 's desire to tackle other challenges as much as Mr. Page's personal ambition. Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Mr. Eric Schmidt wrote on his Twitter account moments after Google Inc. dropped the bombshell that upstaged its fourth-quarter earnings. Mr. Eric Schmidt , 55, will become executive chairman and remain available to advise Mr. Page, 37, and Google Inc.
